text: Ronald Philip Lurie (January 23, 1941 â€“ December 22, 2020) was an American businessman and politician. He was the mayor of Las Vegas, Nevada from 1987 to 1991. Lurie was a member of the Democratic Party. Lurie was born in Los Angeles, California. Lurie, who had blood cancer, died under hospice care in Las Vegas from COVID-19 on December 22, 2020 at the age of 79. ==References== Category:1941 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Deaths from the COVID-19 pandemic in Nevada Category:Deaths from blood cancer Category:Mayors of Las Vegas Category:Politicians from Los Angeles Category:Businesspeople from Los Angeles Category:Businesspeople from Las Vegas Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians
